post.summary: Returns a paginated list of all state operations of this transaction
Returns a paginated list of all the accounts that were affected by this transaction

get.summary: Returns specified account and it's current state, without assets

post.summary: Returns a paginated list of all currently owned assets for the specified address
Returns a paginated list of all the accounts states with assets for a certain address
Returns a paginated list of all the transaction the specified address was a fromAddr or toAddr
Returns a paginated list of all the stateOperations the specified address was a contextAddr or targetAddr

fromPublicAddress.description: This is the public address of the user that created the transation.
